alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 3:15AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...AREAS OF DENSE FOG THROUGH 8AM THIS MORNING... Localized dense fog will continue across portions of southeast Wyoming this morning. While the dense fog is not widespread, it is locally dense with visibilities under one quarter mile observed in the North Platte River Valley of Goshen and Platte Counties, the Niobrara River Valley of Niobrara County, and the Cheyenne Ridge in central and eastern Laramie County. Motorists are urged to allow for extra time to reach your destination and plan for reduced visibility along portions of US Highways 18, 20, 26, and 85, and Interstate Highways 25 and 80.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Goshen County; Niobrara County
